response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just any item; it's an investment in efficiency and quality that exceeds expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny. Considering its worth to you stands at $10,000, I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire something truly remarkable at a competitive price. I trust you'll find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
